result.arabic_text: قُلۡ صَدَقَ ٱللَّهُۗ فَٱتَّبِعُواْ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۖ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
result.translation: 95.Nabiyow Yalli neh warseeh neh madqeemit usuk Numma yeceek, toysa isin Nabii Ibraahim kicniih kaal muggaqsima mara kinnitoonumut Numma yacee mara tekkeenik, kay diiniy Yalli Nabii Mucammad Arrabat madqe kataata Aka diinittek xabanah gacak, Nabii Ibraahim usuk Yallah Aba Qibaadat Yallat Agleyta haa marih numuh masuginna keenik ixxic.
